content: in first single_crochet single_crochet in fpdc twice bobble in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet bobble in next single_crochet single_crochet in fpdc single_crochet in next single_crochet twice row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first single_crochet fpdc around next fpdc twice single_crochet in next 3 sts fpdc around next fpdc single_crochet in next single_crochet twice row 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in fpdc twice single_crochet in next single_crochet bobble in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in fpdc single_crochet in next single_crochet twice row 6 repeat row 4 row 7- 236 repeat row 3-6 fasten_off with right side facing join yarn to bottom right side of strap piece evenly single_crochet 42 stitches up side to top of twenty-fifth bobble row fasten_off repeat directly across on opposite side and on both sides at opposite end base make 2 row 1 chain 12 turn single_crochet in second chain from hook and in ea st across 11 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in ea single_crochet across 11 single_crochet row 3-42 repeat row 2 finish off joining of base pieces holding the two base pieces tightly together and working into back loop of front piece edging and front loop of back piece edging join yarn at right corner of short side slip_stitch in first 11 single_crochet slip_stitch in next 42 single_crochet slip_stitch in next 11 single_crochet do not finish off trim both pieces of plastic canvas to fit and insert into open side one piece on top of the other for added support sl st in next 42 single_crochet to close base slip_stitch in first slip_stitch finish off assembly with wrong sides of tote front and base together and working into back loop of base edging and front loop of tote front chain join yarn at right corner slip_stitch in ea st across to opposite corner 42 sts do not finish off with wrong sides of strap end and base together and working into back loop of base edging and front loop of strap chain continue to slip_stitch to opposite corner of strap 11 single_crochet do not finish off continue in this way around being careful not to twist strap join with slip_stitch to beginning slip_stitch fasten_off base should be completely attached to tote holding wrong sides of tote piece and strap together and working into back loop of tote edging and front loop of strap edging join yarn at base and slip_stitch up 42 sts in each corner fasten_off each corner and tightly weave in ends ensuring that pieces are well attached it is recommended to line the tote and strap to prevent stretching and to make the inside look pretty cotton fabric works well for the tote lining and grosgrain ribbon will help reinforce the strap
